name: Angel Pendant
content: The combination of deep motifs like being lost in space is interwoven with gold wreaths to enhance the art of the design. In the middle of the pendant, a moving diamond is added, making the product stand out special.

name: Pearl Pendant
content: Gold pendant with delicate, intricate lines studded with moving diamonds. Such a special way of attaching stones makes the pendant more vivid, attracting the eyes of the opposite person.

name: Gold necklace with stones
content: It is a method of coating with electrostatic paint or covering with precious materials of the platinum group. This technology makes the product more iridescent, helping the product retain its color longer

name: Pendant with Diamonds
content: Gold pendant with delicate, intricate lines studded with moving diamonds. Such a special way of attaching stones makes the pendant more vivid, attracting the eyes of the opposite person.

name: 585 Gold Pendant
content: A precious rosebud presented in gold and decorated with shining rhinestones will decorate your formal and evening looks. The rich colors, brilliance of precious metals and the shine of impeccable stones can complete the chosen outfit, regardless of its cut and color.

name: Rose Gold Ring with Diamonds
content: The sophistication of rose petals covered with gold and shining brightly thanks to the hands of experienced jewelers of SOKOLOV. This jewelry will be a sophisticated addition to your favorite dress and your natural charm.

name: Rose Gold Ring with Diamonds
content: It is a method of coating with electrostatic paint or covering with precious materials of the platinum group. This technology makes the product more iridescent, helping the product retain its color longer.

name: Gold Ring with Cz Stone
content: Gentle and pristine, the delicately attached CZ stones will cherish and hug her delicate fingers, creating a feeling of elegance and luxury. CZ stones were also used by Sokolov to add sparkle to the gold ring. Wearing this design, she will be like a proud and seductive princess stepping out into a magnificent, majestic and shining party.

name: Swarovski White Gold Ring
content: Swarovski marble is produced by the Swarovski stone factory. The optical properties of this stone are almost the same as diamond. Each way of attachment of the ring is solved with special laziness to increase the durability of the product

name: Gold Ring with Swarovski Zirconia Stone
content: Sokolov brand gold ring has an exquisite design with luxurious, brilliant Swarovski CZ stones. Brings charm and prominence to women's hands, making your wedding party more impressive and shining

name: Single Halo Pendant
content: Luxurious, elegant and brilliant are the words that describe the beauty of the Single Halo MDA2102 Diamond Pendant. With a prominent large diamond design in the center attached to 4 spokes, it creates a feeling of safety and security.

name: Halo Floral Pendant
content: Like other classic Halo designs, the Halo Floral MDA2104 pendant brings elegance, nobility and shines brightly from every angle. The pendant stands out with a large round diamond fixed on 6 prongs combined with a Halo ring of sheet stones attached into flower petals that completely hug the main diamond.

name: Cushion Halo Pendant
content: Unique and feminine is what the Cushion Halo MDA2107 women's pendant brings to the wearer. New design with Cushion master, this is a square diamond shape with rounded corners creating softness and femininity for the jewelry.

name: Custom Halo Pendant
content: With the message Every woman is a brilliant flower, Tierra brings a collection of mesh pendants with the main design being jade flowers and amethyst, of which the Custom Halo MDA2117 women's sword pendant becomes famous. turned on by his beautiful cruelty.

name: Heart-Shaped Reverse Pendant
content: With the message Every woman is a brilliant flower, Tierra brings a collection of mesh pendants with the main design being jade flowers and amethyst, of which the Custom Halo MDA2117 women's sword pendant becomes famous. turned on by his beautiful cruelty.

name: Eternity Princess Wedding Rings
content: NCF0003 women's wedding ring is an Eternity women's ring model with a simple but feminine and luxurious design. The ring has a slim design that helps accentuate women's small hands. A strip of sheet stones is attached along the ring band to increase sparkle

name: Eternity Flat Cut NCF0016
content: Eternity Flat Cut NCF0016 women's wedding ring is a simple but unique style women's wedding ring with a classic, sophisticated Eternity design combined with a sophisticated flat cut design encrusted with small diamonds arranged alternately. Together with meticulousness, it creates a highlight and makes the appearance of this Eternity ring more eye-catching and feminine.

name: Ring Eternity NCF0018
content: Eternity diamond wedding rings are loved for their luxurious beauty and profound meaning of faithful love. Eternity wedding rings appeared as early as around 2000-1800 BC, when the ancient Egyptians wanted to create an (eternal circle) so they attached small diamonds consecutively, sharing the same starting point. and endpoint

name: Ring Eternity NCF0022
content: Originating in ancient Egypt, the Eternity diamond wedding ring consists of small stones attached together to form a circle, representing eternal, indestructible love. With this profound meaning, Eternity diamond rings are always the top choice for couples looking for a 100-year-old keepsake.

name: Geometric Eternity Ring NCF0024
content: Bringing perfect and sophisticated beauty, the NCF0024 women's wedding ring is uniquely designed with a sophisticated bezel prong and a small sparkling diamond firmly placed in a delicate diamond-shaped frame, combined with a diamond groove. The panels are meticulously attached, creating a beautiful and luxurious appearance that attracts all girls' eyes from the first time.

content: Bracelet VTA1201 is a diamond jewelry suitable for girls who pursue a simple style but still retain elegance and sophistication.

name: Pav√© bracelet 1 VTA3101
content: Pave bracelet 1 VTA3101 is one of the diamond bracelet models with an elegant but no less delicate design. This women's bracelet is studded with diamonds along the bracelet, creating a solid and sparkling diamond surface.

name: Chain bracelet VTA5103
content: VTA5103 pave bracelet is a diamond bracelet with an elegant, modern design. This women's bracelet model is studded with diamonds along the bracelet combined with a youthful and delicate chain style, creating a perfect overall look that sparkles when light shines on it.

name: Custom Design bracelet VTA8104
content: Custom Design VTA8104 bracelet is a suitable bracelet for girls pursuing a luxurious and individual style. The women's bracelet is designed to look like a chain made of many small sparkling diamonds.
